meanings.definition: A low, strong cart without fixed sides, used for carrying heavy loads.
meanings.sent1: The workers loaded the heavy rocks onto the drays for transport.
meanings.sent2: The drays were essential for moving the construction materials around the site.
meanings.sent3: The drays lined up in a row, ready to carry the massive logs to the sawmill.
meanings.sent4: The drays trundled along the bumpy road, their wheels creaking under the weight.
meanings.sent5: The image of the drays hauling the goods up the steep hill stayed in his mind.

meanings.sent5: The way he drays the items showcases his expertise in handling delicate cargo.
